0FF 200		ci8    100/0x08 =  20   0x200/0x08 =040 1000
0FF 400		ci8    100/0x08 =  20   0x400/0x08 =080 2000
1FF 200		ci8    200/0x08 =  40   0x200/0x08 =040 1000
3FF 080		rgb5a1 400/0x10 =  40   0x080/0x10 =008 0800
3FF 100		rgb5a1 400/0x10 =  40   0x100/0x10 =010 1000
3FF 200		i4     400/0x04 = 100   0x200/0x04 =080  800
